alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette; Gonzales; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Caldwell, south central Bastrop, northeastern Gonzales, Fayette and northwestern Lavaca Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Round Top to 9 miles northeast of Palmeto State Park. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Schulenburg, Flatonia, Moulton, Waelder, Fayetteville, Round Top, Muldoon, Cistern, Carmine, Komensky, Swiss Alp, Dubina, Rutersville, Warrenton, Engle, Dilworth, Waldeck, Plum and Ammannsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Texas.
